exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, aQ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) inclP : incl aP aQ x : list (Term A n) Hx : canonical A0 eqA ltM x Hu : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) x Hx)) Heq : Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a = exist (fun q : poly A0 eqA ltM => reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q)) (exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) x Hx) Hu rednf : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aQ (mults multA (n:=n) (match x as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> Term A n) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => T1 A1 n | a :: l => let (co, m) as p return (canonical A0 eqA ltM (p :: l) -> Term A n) := a in fun H' : canonical A0 eqA ltM ((co, m) :: l) => (divA A1 co match H' with | conj _ H0 => fun H1 : eqA co A0 => and_ind (fun (_ : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) l) (H3 : ~ eqA co A0) => False_ind False (H3 H1)) H0 end, M1 n) end Hx) x) (pO A n) The term "invA" has type "A -> A" while it is expected to have type "A -> A -> A" (cannot unify "A" and "A -> A").

n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), SpolyQ A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q -> ltM => reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q)) (exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) ((a0, m) :: x) (conj o n0)) Hu H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aQ (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multA (divA A1 a0 (fun H1 : eqA a0 A0 => and_ind (fun (_ : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) x) (H3 : original: intros a aP aQ inclP rednf. unfold red in *. unfold nf in rednf. destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a) as [u Hu] eqn:Heq. destruct u as [x Hx]. simpl in rednf. specialize (confl_reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP a Hu rednf) as Hconf. destruct Hconf as [q Hq]. apply reducestar_cb2_lem with (x:=q). - apply CombLinear_incl with (aP:=aP); auto. - apply reducestar_in_pO.
